text: Ana ajula jwana kulembelelaga chakutaŵa chakwe pa woga wakun'jogopa Allah ni (pa kusachilila) chinonyelo (Chakwe) ngaŵa ni jwali jwambone, kapena ajula jwana kulembelelaga chakutaŵa chakwe munjengwe mwa lisimbo lyaagumuchila ni gumuchila najo m’moto wa Jahannama? Sano Allah jwangaajongola ŵandu ŵakulitenda lupuso
